analysis.description:
Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol#346-368) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-coinContract.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol#362-364)

Crowdsale.endIco (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol#376-381) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-coinContract.transfer(coinContract.owner(),coinContract.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol#335-343):
	External calls:
	- owner = coinContract.owner() (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol#338-339)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol#339-340)
	- remainingTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x5f8787f937c3e87d4867f526d4b133a5114e20f4.sol#340-343)
